channel.title: Whats causing this?
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/3043/savvrrrrcopyue6.png[/img][/URL]
Any Ideas whats causing it? It Crashes server, im on cheezscape[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 01:00:29 AM[/size][hr]Also when It trys to auto reconnect it jut says connect dis connect and so on untill server shuts down..
Edit- For some reason I was killing a guy he came back 5th time and i attacked him and other npcs and got this in moparclient
[code]Error downloading news Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1400) at client.method146(client.java:11914) at client.method102(client.java:7747) at client.method9(client.java:8620) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Whats causing this?
item.dc:creator: @bryan_m bryan m
item.description:
@bryan_m wrote:

fix your news you messed it up

Read full topic
